Section.name: About AIET
Section.description:
Avanthi Institute of Engineering and Technology, Hyderabad was established in 1991 under the sponsorship of Avanthi Educational Society in order to impart high quality education with industrial exposure and professional training.
The table given below shows Avanthi Institute of Engineering and Technology TS EAMCET Cutoff 2024 for Round 1.
